SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc31
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc31.client_server.interfaces

Interface ClientCommands

All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiClient, TCPClient
public interface ClientCommands
Defines the methods executable by all the Client. These methods are involved with the UI classes which directly communicate with the user. Based on the input received from the user a specific method is invoked by theUI.
See Also:
  • TUI
  • GUI

  • Method Details

    • setUI

      void setUI(UI ui)
      Sets the Client attribute of the UI to the reference received as a parameter. Can be invoked by either the Client.main(String[]) method or the GUI.runUI() method.
      Parameters:
      ui - is the reference of the UI chosen by the client to be set as the new value of the client's attribute.
      See Also:
      • TUI
      • GUI

    • setUsernameCall

      void setUsernameCall(String username) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new ConnectObj with Token.getTempToken() and Token.getToken() and sends it to the Controller(socket) or RmiServer(rmi) to connect to the server
      Parameters:
      username - username chosen by the user
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • setUsername

      void setUsername(String username)
      Sets the username of the current user To use both when a reconnection is not detected and when a reconnection is refused
      Parameters:
      username - : name to save the current client

    • createGame

      void createGame(int maxNumberPlayer) throws RemoteException
      Method used to create a game with specified number of players
      Parameters:
      maxNumberPlayer - Maximum number of player allowed in a game (from 2 to 4). It is also the minimum number of players needed to start the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(int gameId) throws RemoteException
      Method used to attempt to join a specific game
      Parameters:
      gameId - Identifier of the game (Currently it is a progressive number starting from 0)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • quitGame

      void quitGame() throws RemoteException
      Method used to quit from the current game. Rejoin to the will not be allowed
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • getGameList

      void getGameList() throws RemoteException, NoGamesException
      Command used to receive the list of games from the server Answer is received from invalid input: '{@link /*missing*/}'
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs
      NoGamesException - if there are no games available on the server

    • setReady

      void setReady(boolean ready) throws RemoteException
      Method used to notify the change the ready status of the player to the server
      Parameters:
      ready - true if the player is ready, false if player is not ready
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • drawGold

      void drawGold(int index) throws RemoteException
      Draws a gold card directly from the goldDeck and adds it to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      index - index=0 to draw from top of the deck. index=1,2 to draw card1,card2
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • drawResource

      void drawResource(int index) throws RemoteException
      Draws a resource card directly from the goldDeck and adds it to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      index - index=0 to draw from top of the deck. index=1,2 to draw card1,card2
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • chooseSecretObjective1

      void chooseSecretObjective1() throws RemoteException
      Chooses secret objective 1 between the two possible secret objectives
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • chooseSecretObjective2

      void chooseSecretObjective2() throws RemoteException
      Chooses secret objective 2 between the two possible secret objectives
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • playStarter

      void playStarter() throws RemoteException
      Plays the starter card on the current starter card side
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • play

      void play(Point point) throws RemoteException
      Plays the current selected card in hand on the current selected card side
      Parameters:
      point - contains the coordinates where to place the card in the PlayArea map. (Notice: starter card placed in [0;0])
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • selectCard

      void selectCard(int index) throws RemoteException
      Set the selected card in hand
      Parameters:
      index - index of card in hand from 0 to 2
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • changeSide

      void changeSide() throws RemoteException
      Change side of the current selected card in hand (Notice: True=Front, False=Back)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • changeStarterSide

      void changeStarterSide() throws RemoteException
      Change side of starter card (Notice: True=Front, False=Back)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • getGameID

      int getGameID() throws RemoteException
      If the player is in a match the method will notify the current game ID
      Returns:
      Current game ID
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • getUsername

      String getUsername()
      Used to obtain current Client username
      Returns:
      Current user username

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(String username, String message) throws RemoteException
      Send a public message to all players in the same game
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the current user, which is sending the message
      message - Content of the message that is being sent
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(String fromUsername, String toUsername, String message) throws RemoteException
      Send a private message to one specific player in your same game
      Parameters:
      fromUsername - Username of the current user, which is sending the message
      toUsername - Username of the player the current user is sending the message to
      message - Content of the message that is being sent
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a generic connection error occurs

    • setToken

      void setToken(int token, boolean temporary)
      Sets the private values of tempToken and token to the values received as a parameter. Is implemented both in RmiClient and TCPClient. If the temporary value is true the method only sets the value of tempToken. If the temporary value is false the method sets both the values of token and tempToken, also writes on the file the new value of the token received.
      Parameters:
      token - is the new value of the token to be set.
      temporary - indicates if the token to set is the temporary one or both of them.
      See Also:
      • Token
      • RmiClient
      • TCPClient

    • getToken

      Token getToken()
      Return the reference of the Client Token. The Client can be either a RmiClient or a TCPClient.
      Returns:
      the reference of the Token of the Client.

    • reconnect

      void reconnect(boolean reconnect) throws RemoteException
      Sends a new ReconnectObj to the Controller. The boolean parameter indicates if the user wants to reconnect or not to the match where the user was before disconnecting.
      Parameters:
      reconnect - indicates if the user wants to reconnect to the match or not.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during the remote method call.
